tha-ap470:0.3_0: As a result, he was hardened in the world,
tha-ap470:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap470:2.4_0: and the fruit of good and results.
tha-ap470:3.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
tha-ap470:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap470:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Bāhumatī.
tha-ap470:7.1_0: Eight senior monks, including a gamblers, and eight.
